projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Permintaan Jasa Website
projects.bodyText:
- Permintaan Jasa is a web app that designed to manage service requests, from budget planning to final reporting.
 - Includes Master Data, Transaction, and Reporting menus
 - A personal project.

projects.title: Linkedin Content Presence
projects.bodyText:
- Making Carousel Content for linkedin post
- From 780 to 16.000 Content impressions in 90 days. 
 - Getting 1000 - 5000 views per post
